name: GoCommerce
description: A lightweight Go-based API for e-commerce sites on the JAMstack

GOCOMMERCE_JWT_SECRET.decscription: A generated key you can use for making authenticated calls to the service

GOCOMMERCE_SITE_URL.description: The URL of the site where you will sell your products

GOCOMMERCE_PAYMENT_STRIPE_ENABLED.description: Set to true to enable Stripe payment processing

GOCOMMERCE_PAYMENT_STRIPE_PUBLIC_KEY.decscription: Required if Stripe is enabled. Get this key from Stripe.

GOCOMMERCE_PAYMENT_STRIPE_SECRET_KEY.decscription: Required if Stripe is enabled. Get this key from Stripe.

GOCOMMERCE_SMTP_HOST.decscription: Required for sending customer emails. Get from your transactional email provider. example: smtp.sparkpost.com

GOCOMMERCE_SMTP_PORT.decscription: Required for sending customer emails. Get this port number from your transactional email provider.

GOCOMMERCE_SMTP_USER.decscription: Required for sending customer emails. Get this username from your transactional email provider.

GOCOMMERCE_SMTP_PASS.decscription: Required for sending customer emails. Get this password from your transactional email provider.

GOCOMMERCE_SMTP_ADMIN_EMAIL.decscription: Required for sending customer emails. This address will send customer emails and will receive order notifications.
